meanings.sent1: The horseless carriage moved quietly down the street.
meanings.sent2: The family decided to purchase a horseless vehicle for their daily commute.
meanings.sent3: The horseless wagon seemed to be missing something important.
meanings.sent4: The horseless world felt strangely empty without the sound of hooves.
meanings.sent5: The horseless field was a stark reminder of modern transportation.

meanings.sent1: The horseless rider struggled to keep up with the others.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's horseless cart was in need of repair.
meanings.sent3: The horseless cowboy felt out of place in the rodeo.
meanings.sent4: The horseless knight rode into battle on a mechanical steed.
meanings.sent5: The horseless stable was an unusual sight in the countryside.
